meanings.definition: A person who is enthusiastic about or obsessed with watching videos.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a videophiles who spends hours watching funny cat videos.
meanings.sent2: Videophiles often have a collection of movies and TV shows.
meanings.sent3: The videophiles couldn't stop laughing at the silly video of a dancing penguin.
meanings.sent4: Her brother is such a videophiles that he can recite lines from his favorite movies.
meanings.sent5: The videophiles' eyes lit up with excitement when a new movie trailer was released.
